Package controller

Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is AppointmentController class. This class is for the Appointment Screen of the application.

  • Method Details

    • onWeekRadioButton

      public void onWeekRadioButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This is the week radio button method. This method populates the report by contact table by filtering all appointments in the database, then using lambda expression to add appointments that occur within a week from the date of log in to the filtered list in order to populate the table.
      Lambda expression: to append the filtered list of appointments within a week from the date of log in.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the week radio button action
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database not found

    • onMonthRadioButton

      public void onMonthRadioButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This is the month radio button method. This method populates the report by contact table by filtering all appointments in the database, then using lambda expression to add appointments that occur within a month to the filtered list in order to populate the table.
      Lambda expression: to append the filtered list of appointments within a month from the date of log in.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the month radio button action
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database not found

    • onAllRadioButton

      public void onAllRadioButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This is the all radio button method. This method populates the report by contact table with all appointments by calling the get all appointments from AppointmentDao class when the user selects the all radio button.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the all radio button action
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database not found

    • onCustomerButton

      public void onCustomerButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This is the customer button method. This method loads the Customer Screen when the user clicks on customer button.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the customer button action
      Throws:
      IOException - if fxml file not found

    • onReportButton

      public void onReportButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This is the report button method. This method loads the Report Screen when the user clicks on report button.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the report button action
      Throws:
      IOException - if fxml file not found

    • onLogOutButton

      public void onLogOutButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This is the log out method. This method exits the application when the user clicks on log out button and confirms to exit.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the log out button action

    • onAddAppointmentButton

      public void onAddAppointmentButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This is the add appointment method. This method loads the Add Appointment Screen when the user clicks on add appointment button.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the add appointment button action
      Throws:
      IOException - if fxml file not found

    • onModifyAppointmentButton

      public void onModifyAppointmentButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      This is the modify appointment method. This method loads the Modify Appointment Screen when the user clicks on modify appointment button. It retrieves the information of the selected appointment by calling the pass appointment method from ModifyAppointmentController and displays an error message if no appointment is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the modify appointment button action
      Throws:
      IOException - if fxml file not found
      SQLException - if database not found

    • onDeleteAppointmentButton

      public void onDeleteAppointmentButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This is the delete appointment method. This method deletes a selected appointment when the user clicks on delete appointment button and confirms to delete. It displays an error message if no appointment is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the delete appointment button action
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database not found

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This is the initialize method. This method initializes the appointment controller by making connection to the database and populates the appointment table by calling the get all appointments method from AppointmentDao class.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known
      resourceBundle - resourceBundle the resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized
